dict.acceptation: （用枪等）打猎；拍摄；给…注射；射门，投篮；
幼苗，嫩芽；发射；摄影；狩猎；
感叹词（用于表示惊奇，并不强烈的愤怒或失望）；

sent.orig: Compare zoom, whiz, zip, shoot, dart, and nip.
The police only rarely shoot to kill, ie try to kill the people they shoot at.
Usually each of the germination can shoot, shoot germination of a ship can grow into branches.
sent.trans: 一般每个节间的芽都能萌发，萌发的芽一船都能长成枝条。

sent.orig: Nan bamboo shoot, also called Mao bamboo shoot or Yulanpian driedbamboo shoots.
sent.trans: 楠笋又名毛竹笋，玉兰片。

sent.orig: Through balance weight, the judge says finally:'sentence capital punishment, shoot instantly! Shoot instantly!"
sent.trans: 经过权衡轻重，法官最后说：“判处死刑，立即枪毙！”
